notesStmt.note: Expl. verso:...et aruspicibus uana falsitatis deleramenta
Other leaves of this ms. are scattered in several different libraries.
Cf. E. A. Lowe in Levre
Given to me by Mr. R. Contan Mar. 1855
Acquired by J. F. Lewis in 1914
See also Kraus Catalogue 88, Early Medieaeval and Renaissance Mss., p. 11 for desc. and photos of leaves from same ms. and his Catalogue 95, Item 3 (1962), pp. 12-15 for same leaves.
See Letter of Francis Wormald, 4 Sept. 1957.
Capp. XLIII-XLIV R. Ehwald, Aldhelmi Opera [=Monumenta Germaniae Historica, Auctores Antiquissimi, XV]. pp. 296, line 9-297, line 9.
Anglo-Saxon Manuscripts in America, by Roland L. Collins (1976) - no. 1b reproduced as Plate 2
Bond's Supplement (1962), p. 454; call number is XXIV:1

msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts
